mapper.select: select listName,count(listName) as listCount from playList where userId=#{userId} group by listName
select p.id,p.listName,p.musicId,m.title,m.singer,m.album,m.photo,m.genre,m.photo from playList p inner join music m on p.musicId=m.id where userId=#{userId} and listName=#{listName};
mapper.delete: delete from playList where userId=#{userId} and listName=#{listName}
